title: on me by section 1(2) of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 

(Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic road act 2023 (commencement) (no 2) order 2023

title: on me by section 1(2) of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023),
heading: 2. The 31st day of July 2023 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of July 2023 is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023) shall come 
into operation: 

(a) 

section 3; 

(b) 

the following provisions of section 5: 

(i) 

subparagraph (iii) of paragraph (a); 

(ii) paragraphs (b), (d), (e), (g), (i), (k); 

(iii) paragraph (l), except insofar as it relates to – 

(I) 

paragraph (d) of subsection (1), and 

(II) 

subsections (7) to (10), 

of section 56A; 

(iii) paragraphs (m) and (n); 

(iv) paragraph (o), except insofar as it relates to – 

(I) 

paragraph (f) of subsection (2), and 

(II) paragraph (c) of subsection (9), 

of section 78A; 

(v) paragraphs (p) and (q); 

(c) 

paragraph (b) of section 11; 

(d) 

section 12; 

(e) 

(f) 

(g) 

(h) 

(i) 

paragraphs (a), (b), (f), (h), (j), (q) and (r) of section 13; 

paragraph (a) section 14; 

section 44; 

sections 48 to 56; 

sections 58 and 59. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th August, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [392] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 July, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [392]
